Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler suffered a right ankle sprain and left the game early
Post-Match Reflections: Erik Spoelstra shared uncertainty about Jimmy Butler's injury status and mentioned the team's plans to monitor it after the Minnesota Timberwolves game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heat's roster is being adjusted due to Jimmy Butler's injury, with Nikola Jovic being benched and Pelle Larsson replacing him in the second half
